mapper.sql: id, mid, name, icon, actvity_type, test_type
mapper.insert:
insert into member_white_list
id,
mid,
name,
icon,
actvity_type,
test_type,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actvityType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{testType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update member_white_list
mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actvity_type = #{actvityType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
test_type = #{testType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update member_white_list set mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actvity_type = #{actvityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, test_type = #{testType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE member_white_list set test_type = (SELECT CASE WHEN test_type = 1 then 0 ELSE 1 END) where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE member_white_list set actvity_type = (SELECT CASE WHEN actvity_type = 1 then 0 ELSE 1 END) where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT from member_white_list order by id

SELECT
FROM member_white_list WHERE mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER} LIMIT 0,1
